inclusion.criterion: clinical diagnosis of acute asthma exacerbations
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Spirometry revealed a forced expiratory volume in the first second (FEV1) of 60% of the predicted

inclusion.criterion: information and written consent of a legal representative
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is a candidate for general corticosteroid therapy

exclusion.criterion: Chronic lung diseases other than asthma (cystic fibrosis, bronchopulmonary Dysplasia)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough. He didn't respond to the usual corticosteroid inhaler.
